top10_tweets_like: Interested in trying out dynamic #singlecell #RNAvelocity analysis via scvelo Python package @VolkerBergen @fabian_theis @falexwolf but want to stay in #Rstats like me? Check out my #bioinformatics tutorial for using scvelo from within R using reticulate: https://t.co/EnCwN2u9fw https://t.co/fQTzw2EQLm

We are working on a new implementation of the pipe for the next magrittr release. It:

1) has cleaner backtraces
2) is much faster
3) works lazily

Our analysis and testing suggest it should be a drop in replacement for >99.9% of code but we need your help testing it! #rstats https://t.co/2fVFvttsZD
